alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Durham; Granville; Orange; Person; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 4:21PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Person, eastern Orange, southwestern Granville, northwestern Wake, Durham and northeastern Chatham Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over RDU International, or 8 miles southeast of Durham, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Durham, Cary, Chapel Hill, Oxford, Creedmoor, Butner, RDU International, Rougemont and Morrisville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong winds may occur well ahead of any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Chatham; Durham; Granville; Orange; Person; Wake
